reference: Feenberg, D., W. Gentry, D. Gilroy, and H. Rosen, Testing the Rationality of State Revenue Forecasts, Working Paper No. 2628, National Bureau of Economic Research, 1988.

Hyde, A. C. and W. R. Jarocki, Revenue and Expenditure Fore- casting: Some Comparative Trends, in R. P. Golembiewski and J. Rabin (eds.), Public Budgeting and Finance: Behavioral Theoretical, and Technical Perspectives, 3rd edition, New York: Marcel Dekker, 1983.
